targets.expr:
0.001 * 
sum by (cloud,location,environment,domain) (rate(iwdEmail_mailbox_processing_duration_milliseconds_sum{cloud=~"$Cloud",location=~"$Location",environment=~"$Environment",pod=~"$Pod", domain=~"$ActiveTenantName"}[1m])) / 
sum by (cloud,location,environment,domain)
(rate(iwdEmail_mailbox_processing_duration_milliseconds_count{cloud=~"$Cloud",location=~"$Location",environment=~"$Environment",pod=~"$Pod", domain=~"$ActiveTenantName"}[1m]))

panels.title: Mailbox processing average time per Tenant, sec

targets.expr:
0.001 * 
sum by (cloud,location,environment,domain,mailbox) (rate(iwdEmail_mailbox_processing_duration_milliseconds_sum{cloud=~"$Cloud",location=~"$Location",environment=~"$Environment",pod=~"$Pod", domain=~"$ActiveTenantName", mailbox=~"$ActiveMailboxName"}[1m])) / 
sum by (cloud,location,environment,domain,mailbox)
(rate(iwdEmail_mailbox_processing_duration_milliseconds_count{cloud=~"$Cloud",location=~"$Location",environment=~"$Environment",pod=~"$Pod", domain=~"$ActiveTenantName", mailbox=~"$ActiveMailboxName"}[1m]))

targets.expr: sum by (cloud,location,environment,domain) (rate(iwdEmail_inbound_email_processing_duration_milliseconds_sum{cloud=~"$Cloud",location=~"$Location",environment=~"$Environment",pod=~"$Pod", domain=~"$ActiveTenantName", protocol=~"$ActiveInboundProtocol"}[1m]))/sum by (cloud,location,environment,domain)(rate(iwdEmail_inbound_email_processing_duration_milliseconds_count{cloud=~"$Cloud",location=~"$Location",environment=~"$Environment",pod=~"$Pod", domain=~"$ActiveTenantName", protocol=~"$ActiveInboundProtocol"}[1m]))
